tool_description: Extract the information on a Thai driver's license and return text results such as driver's license number and personal information.
name: Thai Drivers License OCR
title: Thai Drivers License OCR

api_list.name: Driver's  License
api_list.description: Extract the information on a Thai driver's license and return text results such as driver's license number and personal information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thai-drivers-license-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/ocr-licensedriver"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thai-drivers-license-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://thai-drivers-license-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/ocr-licensedriver"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thai-drivers-license-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
